Little survival guide to carry with you at all times

Preparing for a world without electricity and oil

In a world where the unexpected is commonplace, "Little survival guide to carry with you at all times" is an indispensable companion. This concise but comprehensive book equips you with crucial knowledge for tackling a multitude of dangerous situations, whether you're on your own or with minimal equipment.

What you'll discover:

  • Basic survival techniques: learn how to ensure your safety, find food and water, and create a shelter using whatever resources you have.
  • Solo first aid: simple but vital steps for treating common or serious injuries in the absence of professional help.
  • Navigation and signposting: techniques for finding your way around and attracting the attention of emergency services in unfamiliar environments.
  • Psychological survival: advice on maintaining a positive frame of mind and strong resilience in extreme situations.
  • Essential equipment list: a practical guide to preparing a minimalist but effective survival kit.
Whether you're a budding adventurer, a solo traveller, or simply concerned about your safety in unexpected situations, this guide is for you. Through clear instructions and practical advice, this book prepares you to face the unexpected with confidence and skill.

Regain control in critical moments with "Little survival guide to carry with you at all times".

We named our publishing house after Isaac Asimov. In his science-fiction universe, he figured out how to preserve humanity through its foundations. We want to do the same.
